description: Got rid of annoying sticatos and replaced with palm mutes. Sounds more natural.
title: Stacy's Mom

description:
- Merged the previous version with my old version to be as accurate as possible.
- Solo is good now, but the bends simply don't sound so great in Songsterr (added a text note there).
- Keyboard part has been slightly rewritten.
- Vocal tracks have been lowered an octave (and rearranged and fixed to the best of my ability, but someone else might want to look at it)
- Tambourine is played in straight 16ths with accents on the 2 and 4. I added these in Guitar Pro but not sure if that translates to Songsterr.
- Section markers are back.
- Bass was good in the previous version, so I left it alone.
- Added the key change at the start of the solo.
- BPM is 118.
title: Stacy's Mom

description: Added in lead and backup vocals, but it's still missing the lyrics.  Fixed the lead guitar part to match what the live performances sound like.  (Which is fairly close to the studio version as far a guitars go.)  Fixed the drumset part (Hopefully, not familiar with converting GP6 files to GP5) and added member names.  Also added claps to the last chorus.  I don't think the final chorus is quite correct but it's as close as I can get it.
title: Stacy's Mom
